detail_desc: Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with matt plastic frames and tinted, mirrored, UV-protective lenses in a shimmering metallic contrasting colour.
Short skirt in crinkled velour with gathered seams for a draped effect. High waist with concealed elastication. Jersey lining.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline, long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, and a high slit at one side of the hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline, long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, and a high slit at one side of the hem.
Fitted thong body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Long sleeves, a seam under the bust and press-studs at the crotch.
Calf-length dress in mesh with a low-cut back and long sleeves. Seam at the waist, a gently flared skirt and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Calf-length dress in mesh with a low-cut back and long sleeves. Seam at the waist, a gently flared skirt and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

Parka in soft cotton twill with a double-layered, drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip and wind flap with buttons down the front. Yoke front and back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and patch front pockets with a flap and button. Drawstring under the bust and at the hem, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Short dress in a sturdy rib knit containing some wool with a deep V-neck and long, voluminous balloon sleeves. Wide fitting at the top with a fitted waist and skirt.
Short dress in a sturdy rib knit containing some wool with a deep V-neck and long, voluminous balloon sleeves. Wide fitting at the top with a fitted waist and skirt.

Sleeveless body in glittery jersey with a V-neck and a round cut-out section with a covered metal ring at the front. Adjustable, spaghetti shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch. Jersey lining.
Short beach kaftan in an airy weave with lace trims. Short, wide sleeves, and a drawstring at the waist.
Short beach kaftan in an airy weave with lace trims. Short, wide sleeves, and a drawstring at the waist.
Bibs in soft cotton jersey with a terry back and press-stud fastening.
Bibs in soft cotton jersey with a terry back and press-stud fastening.
Padded earmuffs in faux fur with a soft fleece inside. Adjustable headband in shimmering imitation leather.

Knee-length dress in lightweight, airy Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck and short puff sleeves. Gathered elastication at the top and down the sleeves, a seam under the bust, concealed elastication at the back of the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved, gently fitted top in soft, airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a round neckline and rounded hem.
Long-sleeved, gently fitted top in soft, airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a round neckline and rounded hem.
Knee-length shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Knee-length shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a fine knit with a sheen. Textured-knit stripes, pointelle-patterned sections and 3/4-length sleeves.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a fine knit with a sheen. Textured-knit stripes, pointelle-patterned sections and 3/4-length sleeves.
Body in ribbed jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Body in ribbed jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless body in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a flatlock seam down the back and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless body in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a flatlock seam down the back and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless body in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a flatlock seam down the back and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless body in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a flatlock seam down the back and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless body in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a flatlock seam down the back and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sunglasses in plastic with metal details. UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sunglasses in plastic with metal details. UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and wide, plastic sidepieces. Tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Round sunglasses in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, sidepieces with metal details and sparkly stone decorations and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a scallop-edged V-neck. Decorative buttons down the front, long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a scallop-edged V-neck. Decorative buttons down the front, long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs, and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a round, frill-trimmed neckline and small opening with ties at the front. Short sleeves with elasticated frill trims, a smocked seam at the waist and a frill-trimmed seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a round, frill-trimmed neckline and small opening with ties at the front. Short sleeves with elasticated frill trims, a smocked seam at the waist and a frill-trimmed seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with plastic beads in various designs. Diameter 3 cm.

Short-sleeved playsuit in a crinkled weave with decorative embroidery. V-neck with a concealed press-stud, a sewn-in wrapover at the top and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the hems. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave. V-neck with a small frill trim, short puff sleeves with smocking and frill trims, frill-trimmed seams at the waist and a flared skirt with a seam and flounce at the hem.
Short, fitted dress in a fine-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, short sleeves and scalloped cuffs and hem with hole embroidery. Unlined.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Smocked bodice with a frill trim at the top, decorative buttons at the front and straight, ankle-length legs.

Short dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-shaped opening and buttons at the front. Short sleeves, and elasticated seam with a tasselled drawstring at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-shaped opening and buttons at the front. Short sleeves, and elasticated seam with a tasselled drawstring at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Off-the-shoulder, calf-length dress in plumeti chiffon made from recycled polyester. Elastication and a small frill trim at the top, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, narrow elastication at the waist and a tiered skirt. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Long dress in lace with a V-neck, wrapover top, cap sleeves and a seam with a grosgrain trim at the waist. Straight-cut, voluminous, pleated chiffon skirt with a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Hoop earrings decorated with faceted glass stones in various shapes. Diameter 5 cm.
Boxy-style jumper in fine-knit wool with a V-neck front and back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, decorative stitching at the back and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style jumper in fine-knit wool with a V-neck front and back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, decorative stitching at the back and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style jumper in fine-knit wool with a V-neck front and back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, decorative stitching at the back and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style jumper in fine-knit wool with a V-neck front and back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, decorative stitching at the back and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in sturdy jersey with a sheen. Round neck, a concealed zip at the back, an asymmetric seam under the bust and a skirt with a seam and flare to the hem. Lined.
Fitted, calf-length dress in sturdy jersey with a sheen. Round neck, a concealed zip at the back, an asymmetric seam under the bust and a skirt with a seam and flare to the hem. Lined.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with a low-cut neckline at the back and double, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with a low-cut neckline at the back and double, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy scuba fabric with visible seams. V-neck, narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy scuba fabric with visible seams. V-neck, narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Short dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Deep V-neck at the front and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, short sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.

Short dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Deep V-neck at the front and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, short sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.

Short dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Deep V-neck at the front and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, short sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.

Oversized shirt in sturdy, organic cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly and button.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly and button.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with decorative gathers at the top, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam under the bust. Lined.

Dress in airy, patterned chiffon with flutter sleeves that continue back over the shoulders. Bodice with smocking at the front and a zip at the back. Tiered skirt with gathered seams and frill trims with overlocked edges. Lined.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with floral appliqués. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt that is lined with two layers of tulle for added width. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
Sequined, V-neck bralette with spaghetti shoulder straps and a zip at the back with a round tab. Jersey lining.

Cold shoulder blouse in crinkled plumeti chiffon made from recycled polyester with narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps. Lace-trimmed flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders and down the front, and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Blouse in an airy weave. Deep V-neck with a crocheted trim and lacing, long, wide sleeves with embroidery and scalloped edges, and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
